tool_description: Creates complex eligibility rules and restrictions for reward items based on customer attributes, membership levels, geographic locations, and behavioral criteria.

item_id.description: Unique identifier of the reward item to set eligibility rules for

membership_levels.description: Array of membership levels eligible for this reward (e.g., ['bronze', 'silver', 'gold'])

geographic_restrictions.description: Array of country/region codes where reward is available (e.g., ['US', 'CA', 'UK'])

minimum_points_balance.description: Minimum points balance required to access this reward

minimum_account_age_days.description: Minimum age of customer account in days

purchase_history_required.description: Whether customer must have previous purchase history

excluded_customer_segments.description: Array of customer segments to exclude from this reward

redemption_limit_per_customer.description: Maximum number of times a customer can redeem this reward

time_window_days.description: Time window in days for redemption limits

blackout_dates.description: Array of date ranges when reward is not available (ISO 8601 format)

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Reward item must exist before setting eligibility rules.
Invalid membership_levels: Must contain valid membership level identifiers from the system.
Invalid geographic_restrictions: Must contain valid ISO country codes (e.g., 'US', 'CA', 'UK').
Invalid minimum_points_balance: Must be a positive integer if specified.
Invalid minimum_account_age_days: Must be a positive integer if specified.
Invalid age_restriction_minimum: Must be between 13-100 if specified.
Invalid redemption_limit_per_customer: Must be a positive integer if specified.
Inconsistent time_window: time_window_days required when redemption_limit_per_customer is specified.
Invalid blackout_dates: Must be valid date strings in ISO 8601 format.
Conflicting eligibility rules: Rules create impossible conditions for customer eligibility.
usage: Provide item_id as required parameter. Configure any combination of eligibility criteria based on business requirements. Use membership_levels and geographic_restrictions for basic segmentation, add behavioral criteria with purchase_history_required and minimum_account_age_days, and set redemption limits with redemption_limit_per_customer and time_window_days.

eligibility_rule_id.description: Unique identifier for the created eligibility rule set

rule_summary.description: Human-readable summary of all eligibility criteria

estimated_eligible_customers.description: Estimated number of customers who meet these criteria

rule_complexity.description: Complexity level of the rule set (simple, moderate, complex)

rule_status.description: Status of the eligibility rule (active, pending, failed)
